API interfaces.description: High-accuracy model with strong reasoning. Use for precise technical tasks, debugging, and complex questions. Use API index 0.
Ultra-fast and extremely low-cost model. Ideal for large document batches, chunked PDF processing, and high-volume workloads.  Use API index 1.
Lightweight, inexpensive model. Suitable for quick rewrites, smaller tasks, and general utility work.  Use API index 2.
Same model as gpt-4.1-mini, but via the Responses API for faster throughput when processing sequential chunks.  Use API index 3.
